alert.note: Alert for Big Island North; Kohala; Lanai Leeward; Lanai Windward; Maui Central Valley South; Maui Leeward West; Maui Windward West (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 11 at 3:38PM HST until December 12 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR PORTIONS OF MAUI COUNTY AND THE BIG ISLAND THROUGH 6 AM HST MONDAY... .Although winds have decreased slightly, select areas still remain windy this afternoon. The strongest winds will occur over and downwind of terrain, and in saddle areas between mountains. Winds are expected to continue to slowly decrease on Monday. ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...East winds 15 to 30 mph with localized gusts over 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Lanai, Maui and the Big Island Hawaii. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to steer, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
